goals.text: I have a position programming websites/apps with PHP and JavaScript. I also mentor future developers with a special interest in Neurodiverse developers.
I work at a company that prides itself on accessibility and user experience.
I am a Jr Developer. My primary role is Web Developer/User Tester.
I work on-site, remote, or hybrid in the NYC area, or California. The company is small to medium sized with an inclusive culture and room for growth.
Preferably in the fields of Health Care and Education.
have the PHP templates/routing and visual design for this website completed. The site is user tested with a wide range of audiences
The site is user tested with a wide range of audiences
